channel.title: Search for draft and append based on title
channel.description:
Each day I create a Journal entry that catches all my day's comments, notes, etc. The title each day is pretty straightforward. "Journal 2022-02-16" for example.
I would like to create a shortcut on IOS so I can simply dictate an item and have it appended to the bottom of the Journal. I've successfully built a shortcut that will always put the entry in a pre-defined note... but I don't see a way to find and append to a note matching the title criteria.
Any help is appreciated.
